## kops scale ig

Scale instances instancegroups

### Synopsis


long description...

```
kops scale ig
```

### Examples

```
  # Scale a ig fixing it to 2 replicas
  kops scale ig --name cluster.kops.ddy.systems nodes --replicas=2
```

### Options

```
      --replicas int   The new desired number of replicas. Required. (default -1)
```
